name: Wingin' it
description:
In this egg-citing short platformer you play as a coin-collecting bird who's just wingin' it. Heh, did you like that yoke, or did it fly over your head? Hoot have  thought I came up with it owl by myself! Now take a gander at my game please, or it'll get hawk-ward!

This is an old project of mine that I abandoned a while ago, so it's not that great. Far from it, in fact. But, I enjoy it, and I hope you'll do too.

Music is from "8-bit fantasy and adventure music" by xDeviruchi. Art by me, using Poltergasm's Hollow Knight colour palatte.
